LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information into file. In ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ShowNumberOfPagesInTheCategoryTree
LocaleResource.Value: Show numbers of pages in category tree

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ShowNumberOfPagesInTheCategoryTree.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show numbers of pages in category tree.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.PageSize
LocaleResource.Value: Page size for grouped CMS page

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.PageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the page size for grouped CMS page. e.g. '10' CMS Simple pages per one Grouped page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.CharsInSmallDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: How many characters of the page to display in the short description of the page. The module looks for the next space in the sentence. It does not break words.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.EnableTopMenuItem.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Add the item in the main Menu for all custom pages which you created in the CMS Manager.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.TopMenuItemName
LocaleResource.Value: The name of Top Menu item

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.TopMenuItemName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Provide the name of Top Menu item for all pages created in the CMS Manager.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ProductDetailsPageSize
LocaleResource.Value: Page size for Product details page

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ProductDetailsPageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number for simple CMS pages on the Product details page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ThumbPictureSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The default size (pixels) for page thumbnail images displayed on list pages.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ProductPagePagesPerPage
LocaleResource.Value: Product page. CMS pages per page

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.ProductPagePagesPerPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number for CMS pages on 'Product' page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.EnablePagesOnHomePage
LocaleResource.Value: Show CMS pages on Home page

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.EnablePagesOnHomePage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable CMS pages on Home page - widget 'home_page_bottom'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.HomePageCMSPagesPerPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number for CMS pages. e.g. '4' CMS pages on Home page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.SearchInBodyByDefault
LocaleResource.Value: Enable search in the page body by default

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.SearchInBodyByDefault.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable search in the page body by default.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.PageSearchTermMinimumLength.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the term minimum length 'Search' page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.NumberOfTags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of CMS page tags that appear in the tag cloud.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.AllowNotRegisteredUsersToLeaveComments
LocaleResource.Value: Allow not registered users to leave comments

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.AllowNotRegisteredUsersToLeaveComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow not registered users to leave comments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Settings.NotifyAboutNewBlogComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to notify store owner about new page comments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Added
LocaleResource.Value: The new CMS page has been added successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Updated
LocaleResource.Value: The CMS page has been updated successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Deleted
LocaleResource.Value: The CMS page has been deleted successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.PageType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Page type can be simple or grouped. In most cases your page will have the Simple page type. You need to use Grouped page type when a new page consists of one or more existing pages that will be displayed on one single page (ex. category page).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.Parent.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select a parent grouped page for this grouped page. Leave this field empty to make this the root level page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.Name.Required
LocaleResource.Value: Please provide a name of the page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.HasPersonalTree.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable if you need that this category has personal tree and this CMS category page will have category tree level.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.ShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Short description for the page. If you don't provide it then the plugin creates it automatically from the Full Description.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.FullDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Full description (the body of the HTML page).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.PageTemplate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a page template. This template defines how this page will be displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.AclCustomerRoles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select customer roles for which the page will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.LimitedToStores.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether the page is available only at certain stores.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.DateUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The date of release this CMS page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.DateUtc.Required
LocaleResource.Value: Please provide a CMS page date.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.IncludeInSitemap.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to include this page in the sitemap.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.AddToTopMenu.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Add this CSM page to Top Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.ShowOnHomePage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to display this CMS page on your store's home page. Recommended for your most popular CMS pages.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.AllowComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked, customers can leave comments about your page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.Tags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Tags are keywords that this page can also be identified by. Enter a comma separated list of the tags to be associated with this page.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.CMSManager.Page.Fields.Tags.NoDots
LocaleResource.Value: Dots are not supported by tags.

LocaleResource.Value: Add this page to the grouped page
